Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Permits dentists to administer influenza and COVID vaccinations and vaccinations related to a public health emergency
Summary: Permits dentists to administer influenza and COVID vaccinations and vaccinations related to a declared public health emergency; requires dentists to report such vaccinations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to permitting dentists to administer influenza and COVID vaccinations and vaccinations related to a public health emergency
